**Curriculum Vitae**

I graduated from the University of Grenoble in 2018 with a PhD in Ecology (supervisor: [Prof. Marie-Elodie Perga](http://wp.unil.ch/lakes/marie-elodie-perga/)). I am currently a Postdoctoral Associate at the University of Vermont, working with [Prof. Ellen Marsden](https://www.uvm.edu/rsenr/profiles/ellen_marsden) and [Prof. Jason Stockwell](http://stockwelllaboratory.com).

My full CV is available [here](files/CV_Rosalie_Bruel.pdf).
